descriptions.overview: 2 patio conversation chairs from the Atworth collection take outdoor entertaining to new levels.
list: Brown, rust-proof aluminum frame with an all-weather wicker back withstands the outdoor elements for use season after season
Peacock blue fabric complements the chocolate hue, bringing rustic charm to your backyard space
Solid olefin cushions are weather, mildew and stain-resistant for lasting outdoor durability
Spring-motion chairs provide superior comfort, so you can sit back and relax for hours
Coordinate with other patio furniture from the Atworth collection to complete your look
Easy no-tool assembly, so you can relax outdoors in no time
5-year frame warranty and 3-year fabric warranty give you peace of mind

reviews.title: "Love them! So comfortable."
reviews.text: We bought four of these and paired them with some end tables, and outdoor rug, and a resin wicker coffee table. Easy to put together. Just make sure you bolt the base on correctly or they will be low in front. The drawing that comes with the instructions doesn't make it very clear which way to mount the base. I've included a picture of the right way to mount the base. Five minutes to assemble after you get it all out of the enormous box. I really wish the ottomans were available. Really pleased with our choice.
reviews.author: Denise

reviews.title: "great buy, looks great"
reviews.text: this set looks great and the wicker looks and feels high quality. i was concerned about the painted aluminum scratching but it holds up pretty well. each box came with a touch up paint that paints on like nail polish and hides any blemishes quickly. the set was easy to put together (two bolts). the chairs sit back quite nicely but can push you forward if you bolt on the springs backwards (easy to do). although I used a power drill to assemble the set comes with an allen wrench for those who do not have any tools. I would recommend this set. it is just a tad more expensive than similar type products but I feel well worth it.
reviews.author: ws

reviews.title: "Patio chairs"
reviews.text: I have had these chairs for several years and absolutely love them.  They are the most comfortable outdoor chair I've ever had.  We use them around the fire table so we use them even into the fall.  I would rather sit in them to read than in the house. My sister sat in one at a BBQ at our house and  now is ordering four for herself. Susan
reviews.author: Susan

reviews.title: "Love these chairs!"
reviews.text: These chairs were SUPER easy to put together!!!! On the bottom of the base & the chair there is stickers that say front with arrows!!! Don't listen to reviews that say they are hard!! The chairs look awesome & supper comfortable. I have NEVER wrote a review but the negative comments on putting the chair together made me!
reviews.author: PoohBear

reviews.title: "Comfortable chairs"
reviews.text: These chairs are nice and comfortable, just make sure they don't get assembled incorrectly where you are sitting forward on them. If that is the case just turn them around to be reassembled correctly.
reviews.author: Staceyphinney

reviews.title: "Awesome Purchase!"
reviews.text: Purchased two sets of these chairs for my rooftop deck.  Couldn't wait for them to arrive! Delivery time was reasonable and delivery set-up and confirmation was quick and convenient.Product quality is fantastic, particularly for the price. Solid aluminum construction and the cushions are well-made and incredibly comfortable. Quick and easy to put together â€”took less than 10 minutes per chair. Instructions were simple to follow.Highly recommend!
reviews.author: ColeZ

reviews.title: "Easy Assembly"
reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, I recommend using a socket wrench instead of the wrench provided in the parts kit. It will make assembly so much easier and faster. I love the thick cushions extremely comfortable.
reviews.author: Jerseyboy

reviews.title: "Awesome and some ideas for backyard"
reviews.text: look at pictures
reviews.author: Rudy

reviews.title: "Comfortable but back cushion too big"
reviews.text: Just got these today and assembled very easily. I am a long legged woman so with the back cushion the edge of the chair hit me mid thigh. Took it off and used a throw pillow and it's great. My dht in law is short so the cushion is great for her. Very wide so could have a grandchild sit with me. Would recommend
reviews.author: Debbie

reviews.title: "Nice Chairs"
reviews.text: For the price, you can't beat these chairs. They are comfortable and look great. When you consider stores like "Patio Connection" want $1,000 or more for a single chair, these are a great deal. The only reason I didn't give them 5 stars is because they were slightly dinged up when they were delivered. Not enough to send them back, but you can tell they get beat up a little in shipment.
reviews.author: RONF

reviews.title: "Cushions tend to melt"
reviews.text: Have had to replace the cushions twice now. Lowes has been good about replacing them free of charge but I'm not sure how this product can be marketed for outdoor use when they melt in 80 degree weather.
reviews.author: Robert

reviews.title: "Comfortable and attractive"
reviews.text: Looks solid, easy to put together (my 2 year old nephew helped!), and looks really lovely. Sadly, I managed to spill something greasy on one of the cushions within the first few days of use, but such is life.
reviews.author: ADob

reviews.title: "Love these chairs"
reviews.text: The chairs are very comfortable. The cushions are thick are are a beautiful shade of blue. Very happy with our purchase
reviews.author: Cindy

reviews.title: "Nice chairs for the price!"
reviews.text: My local Lowe's had these on display and after sitting in them, I bought them on the spot - they are very comfortable and a good fit for shorter people.  I was also disappointed that the matching ottomans are no longer available, but the Carrinbridge ottomans are the same frame style (just plain dark brown instead of the faux woodgrain these chairs have) with a different color cushion.  I bought the Carrinbridge ottomans with the cilantro cushions (a little bit of a 60's vibe with the peacock blue chair cushions but not bad) and figure I'll get matching cushions down the line when these need replacement.  The wicker backs of these chairs set them apart from the Carrinbridge and Gatewood chairs, which are all metal.  The wicker is very nice looking for this price!  Thank you to the reviewers who noted it's easy to assemble them with the seat pitched forward - the store assembled the chairs for me and one was right and one was wrong and knowing the quirk in advance saved me some grief.
reviews.author: HanaleiMoon

reviews.title: "Love this chair! It's so comfortable and inviting."
reviews.text: 2 chairs are a perfect fit for a small upper level lanai.
reviews.author: Stella

reviews.title: "Outdoor chairs"
reviews.text: Very comfortable.  Back cushion is a little 'Fat"
reviews.author: Moss

reviews.title: "Melted"
reviews.text: Our cushions melted as well but unlike the previous person who gave a review no one can seem to find a manufacturer number for me. I suppose I'll return the set and hope the second set of cushions don't melt. It's ridiculous that it's this hard to get replacement cushions. There should be a recall on these. I've had lots of patio furniture but this is the most expensive set I've ever had. The cushions shouldn't melt when sitting outside. It hasn't even been that hot yet this year
reviews.author: Kelly

reviews.title: "Very Happy"
reviews.text: I was lucky enough to purchase a set of these chairs on sale.  They are very pretty and comfortable as well.  The only suggestion that I would have is that the chair base should be marked with front and back labels.  If they are marked, this would eliminate any errors in putting the chairs together and speed up the process.
reviews.author: Hootie

reviews.title: "Comfortable great price"
reviews.text: Love these chairs, yes even the blue color goes with my southwest decor. I do want the ottoman!,,,,,,,, I cannot believe the ottoman is not available anywhere??????  Please bring it back!!!!!
reviews.author: Deb

reviews.text: The chairs are pretty  comfortable. A little too forward sitting. Maybe if we were heavier it would be more comfortable. We're hoping that as they age they'll sit back fiurther. We like the rocking movement.  Love the blue color. Wish the set came with a round coffee table.
reviews.author: Barb

reviews.title: "Comfortable, great styling, easy to assemble"
reviews.text: Love this set! It's a breeze putting it all together. I definitely recommend using a fabric sealant on all the cushions.
reviews.author: CRyan

reviews.title: "so comfortable!"
reviews.text: We spend a lot of time on our deck so we wanted something quality and comfortable. These are as comfortable as we remember from the store. They arrived on the estimated arrival date and were free from dents and scratches. They were terribly heavy and it took 2 grown men and a truck to load them and transport them from the store.  It took my husband less than an hour to put together these chairs, love seat and table.
reviews.author: EmilyB

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: SC

reviews.title: "Good set. Easy to assemble"
reviews.text: Got these with the loveseat and coffee table. It's a nice looking set and very comfy. Assembly is fairly easy - just 2 sets of bolts to attach the bottom to the chairs. It's possible to put it on backwards though, so take the time to double check - the bolts should be closer to the front of chair than back - do that and you'll be fine. They are lightweight for moving in the winter.
reviews.author: CC

reviews.title: "Very comfortable"
reviews.text: Chair is very comfortable and easy to put together. Kept hoping it would o on sale, but bit the bullet and paid full price. Still worth it.
reviews.author: Hfpsychologist

reviews.title: "Mood enhancing"
reviews.text: These were purchased with the loveseat and coffee table. I love them. They are comfortable and along with the loveseat, set a real relaxed atmosphere. My whole family and my friends fell in love with them as soon as they arrived for my get together. I have them under a Pergola (also purchased at Lowe's) with shades of coral accents. Beautiful!
reviews.author: PJ

reviews.title: "Allan Roth Atworth Conversation Rocking Chairs"
reviews.text: Our experience with the Allan Roth Lawley conversation Patio chairs were amazing after having them almost 5 years the wicker began to crack only in a few places.  We looked everywhere for someone to repair and had no luck. We contacted Lowe's customer service hoping to find the wicker so I could attempt to fix the places where it had begun to crack.  After a couple of days we were advised that they could not provide the wicker nor could they have them fixed and worst of that Allan Roth had discontinued that model.   But that if I still had the receipt and under warranty Lowe's would replace them.  We went to our Lowe's store with receipt and liked the Atworth Chairs, they are very well made, the chairs are aluminum and painted to look like a dark wood grain, the blue cushion are a very nice touch even if they are not sunbrella as the cushions on our previous set.  We took them home and put them together in less than 15 minutes.  We are extremely satisfied with Allan Roth products and Lowe's customer service and are seriously contemplating buying the complete set of their Atworth patio set and patio table and chairs.
reviews.author: CC

reviews.title: "Attractive, comfortable, easy to assemble"
reviews.text: Love the chairs,  just wish we had a choice of cushion colors.
reviews.author: Susan

reviews.title: "Patio chairs"
reviews.text: Very happy with our new chairs since first purchase have bought six additional chairs in the same set
reviews.author: JOHN

reviews.title: "ALTWORTH SPRING MOTION CHAIRS"
reviews.text: VERY HIGH QUALITY CHAIRS THAT ARE VERY COMFORTABLE. WOULD RECOMMEND AND PURCHASE AGAIN.
reviews.author: STEVE

reviews.title: "Really nice"
reviews.text: I bought two of these chairs and I am very pleased with the quality.  Worth the price!  The only minus is the cushions do not have zippers which would be helpful when they need extra foam added.
reviews.author: Booty

reviews.title: "Excellent Product"
reviews.text: We love our chairs! They are high quality and I feel they will last a long time. Ours are under cover and just get a little sun. The cushions are very comfortable and we love the color.
reviews.author: Jody

reviews.title: "Love it!"
reviews.text: Beautiful color.  Very comfortable.  High quality.  Highly recommend this and the matching love seat and table.  The set looks great on our patio!  Received a lot of compliments!
reviews.author: BB

reviews.title: "Love these but"
reviews.text: I've had these for 1 yr. Sturdy chairs, good material. My only gripe is the back pillow is no wear near as big as the photo. A lot of the back wicker shows
reviews.author: Debby

reviews.title: "Easy to assemble and comfortable"
reviews.text: This was very simple to assemble and comfortable. Color looks good and the wood stain finish on metal looks nice as well.
reviews.author: Pressurewasher

reviews.title: "Nice Chairs"
reviews.text: We purchased these chairs (box=2 chairs) almost a week ago and brought them home to assemble.  Had them assembled  in less then 30 minutes and located them on our deck with the table and loveseat that matched the chairs.  They appear to be well made and are comfortable to sit in and hope they will last a long time.  Will need to find covers to prolong the life on the pillows for each.  Lowe's had them heavily discounted since it was at the end of the summer season.
reviews.author: Neal7694

reviews.title: "Comfort, comfort and comfort."
reviews.text: Assembly was easy, and the instructions provided  were clear and concise.  There were also online videos which provide additional help for those that need it.  These chairs are an excellent addition to my deck.
reviews.author: Jim

reviews.title: "Good chair just watch the assembly instructions"
reviews.text: Good chair but instructions for assembly weren't great. Luckily it's only a few screws but it was hard to tell which way the base went until I assembled it wrong and had to redo it.
reviews.author: Jason

reviews.title: "Nice and easy"
reviews.text: Easy to put together no problems there. One review mentioned touchup paint. Mine had no paint. Only blue cushions?  I love the blue!  Best looking set at lowes
reviews.author: Jody

reviews.title: "Great Quality, Comfortable, and Easy to Assemble"
reviews.text: It is clear that allen + roth took the time to produce a quality product.  The packaging makes this clear right off the bat.  The chairs are well packed to avoid damage in shipment with first-rate materials yet they are easy to remove from the box.  The instructions are clear with excellent diagrams.  Assembly was a snap -- all of the holes lined up perfectly.  The chairs are comfortable to sit in and the chair rock politely when asked but are very stable if you just want to sit still and enjoy the view.This product is solid value for the cost.
reviews.author: LakeHouse

reviews.title: "Extreme Comfort & Quality"
reviews.text: These chairs are worth the price, nothing flimsy about the frames or cheap about the cushions.  I like the freedom of movement to rock if I prefer and it also allows the chair to the tilt to the perfect angle for comfort no matter your height.  The only slight complaint might be the hardness of the arm rests but a cushion there would just turn to mush over time anyway, especially in an out door environment.
reviews.author: Dave

reviews.title: "But no touch-up paint...."
reviews.text: The chairs arrived as scheduled, correctly assembled. However, the touch-up paint others received wasn't included. I spent over an hour with my local Lowe's, Lowe's customer service, and Allen+Roth trying to get it, but no luck. There are some small paint scrapes, so in lieu of the paint which would have been an easy fix, I may have to return and exchange at least one chair.
reviews.author: Doug

reviews.title: "Stylish chairs"
reviews.text: I just finished assembling these chairs. Easy peasy and they are beautiful. Cushions are much thicker than expected and the frame is sturdy and nice-looking. I gave them a 4 because they aren't rockers exactly, though they do move some. I look forward to using them on my screen porch.
reviews.author: DuckDiva

reviews.title: "The cushion melt in the sun"
reviews.text: Beautiful chairs- super comfortable but all the cushions have melted in various places.  This is happening in the Ohio sun-where temperatures rarely go above 80 degrees, the point being this could potentially be a fire hazard in more arid areas.
reviews.author: Heidi

reviews.title: "Patio chairs"
reviews.text: We replaced our old set that was 11 years old and still decent furniture. We looked for several weeks and kept going back to this set. Very well constructed and cushions are high quality material. Very easy to assemble. Highly recommend for the money.
reviews.author: Bill

reviews.title: "Great buy"
reviews.text: Purchased these chairs when they were discounted at our local LOWES store. Best purchase I've made in a while. Have been enjoying them since that day. Very sturdy and comfortable.
reviews.author: Tweedygirl

reviews.title: "Nice chairs but"
reviews.text: Like both chairs but tried to ordered ottoman and was told they do not ha e and will not have in the future. If I k re that I would have bought another brand. What good are 2 chairs with no ottoman and can't even get them in the future
reviews.author: Donna

reviews.title: "Quality and comfort"
reviews.text: Very easy to put together.great, sturdy quality and very comfortable. Bought on sale though for good discount plus I used a 10% off coupon
reviews.author: Paula

reviews.title: "Comfortable high quality chairs"
reviews.text: frame Is well built and sturdy to date. Cushions are good high quality cushions. Should last a long time.
reviews.author: BertK

reviews.title: "Easy to assemble."
reviews.text: They seem to be made well & holding up fine. We are all average size people though.
reviews.author: patm2007

reviews.title: "Extreme Comfort & Quality"
reviews.text: These chairs are worth the price, nothing flimsy about the frames or cheap about the cushions.  I like the freedom of movement to rock if I prefer and it also allows the chair to the tilt to the perfect angle for comfort no matter your height.  The only slight complaint might be the hardness of the arm rests but a cushion there would just turn to mush over time anyway, especially in an out door environment.

There are some small paint scrapes, so in lieu of the paint which would have been an easy fix, I may have to return and exchange at least one chair.

reviews.text: Very easy to put together.great, sturdy quality and very comfortable. Bought on sale though for good discount plus I used a 10% off coupon

reviews.text: frame Is well built and sturdy to date. Cushions are good high quality cushions. Should last a long time.

reviews.title: "Easy to assemble."
reviews.text: They seem to be made well & holding up fine. We are all average size people though.
reviews.author: patm2007

reviews.title: "Almost 5 Stars, but..."
reviews.text: I would give 5 stars except that there aren't any matching ottomans to go with it. -easy to assemble-seems to be well made
reviews.author: BretLeeC

reviews.text: This was better than expected. Real easy to put together!
reviews.author: Chantel

reviews.title: "Comfortable and beautiful!"
reviews.text: This is the pop of color we were looking for and SUPER comfortable!! We love our new furniture so much!
reviews.author: Amy

reviews.title: "Solid"
reviews.text: Chairs are solidly built and comfy. Great addition
reviews.author: Lisa

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.

questions.question: "Do these chairs rock or move at all?"
questions.author: Bill

answers.author: allen + roth Team
answers.text: these motion chairs have slight rocking motion.

answers.author: Tate
answers.text: I'm pretty sure these chairs do rock (at least slightly). I sat in one in a store last weekend and it had a spring in it to rock back when you leaned. Not really a "rocker" though.

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: No, this product does not rock or move in any direction.

questions.question: "Do these EVER go on sale? I'd like to purchase to complete a set, but $250 for a chair is crazy."
questions.author: Ariel

answers.author: LarryNC
answers.text: Now they are $275 per chair! The Big Orange home store has a set of FOUR aluminum spring motion chairs for $500. Why would you get two for $550 now?

answers.author: Queen
answers.text: I have them brand new for $275, new still in the box

answers.author: Ray
answers.text: Lowe's will do promotions throughout the season. Remember, the frame has a 5 year warranty.

questions.question: "What is seat back height? The number 660 shown on specifications cannot be a correct number."
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: allen + roth Team
answers.text: Thank you for your interest in the Atworth Conversation chairs. The seat height is 17", we will update this information.

answers.author: LarryNC
answers.text: You could estimate this using the overall height and the seat height, 35.3" - 18" = 17.3 inches. Of course we don't really know if that is from the metal seat base or the top of the seat cushion (but I'm guessing from the top of the cushion.)

questions.question: "What is the weight capacity for this chair?"
questions.author: Rose

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: This has a 250 lb. weight limit.

questions.question: "what other colors sill these be availsble in & when will they be available?"
questions.author: Tina

answers.author: allen + roth Team
answers.text: Thank you for your interest in the Atworth Set of 2 Motion Chairs. This set comes with the Peacock Blue cushions as shown on the website, but other cushions are available for purchase if you want to change up your look. Search "Deep Seat Cushion" on Lowe's website to see available options,

answers.author: CommunityAnswer
answers.text: Yes, it's two chairs in one box.

questions.question: "Can i pressure wash the pillow fabrics clean?"
questions.author: kc

answers.author: allen + roth Team
answers.text: Yes, but you will need to use the low pressure setting.

questions.question: "How well does the wicker trim hold up in the elements"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: allen + roth Team
answers.text: The wicker is made of all-weather resin material which is UV treated for outdoor use. It has 1-year limited warranty against color fading and fraying. The longevity of the furniture can be extended by using a patio cover over the set to protect the set from outdoor elements when not in use.

questions.question: "Hello, I need to purchase 10 bottom cushions in the Atworth deep seat style in peacock, how and how much please?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: allen + roth Team
answers.text: Thank you for your interest in the Atworth deep seat cushions. Please contact 1-866-267-7772 for further assistance.

questions.question: "Do these cushions need to be removed when expecting rain, or can they get wet?"
questions.author: Anonymous

answers.author: allen + roth Team
answers.text: Thank you for your interest in the Atworth motion conversation chair. Solid olefin cushions are weather, mildew and stain-resistant for lasting outdoor durability.
